title: Secure Energy Transactions Using Blockchain Leveraging AI for Fraud Detection and Energy Market Stability
summary: Peer-to-peer trading and the move to decentralized grids have reshaped the energy markets in the United States. Notwithstanding, such developments lead to new challenges, mainly regarding the safety and authenticity of energy trade. This study aimed to develop and build a secure, intelligent, and efficient energy transaction system for the decentralized US energy market.
